answers.answer: Hey don't feel bad... I cheat too... I would completely resent being pregnant if I followed the strict diet ALL the time... as long as its not a habit you and your baby will fine... plus you've dealt with it before and I'm sure you don't follow it all to a T
No, somebody said here to do my insulin in my stomach so that's how I've been doing it and is working, is getting normal, so now I feel better now

question: But I had strawberry pancakes for breakfast and they were delicious, lol is been normal lately, that's why I ate it ♡♡
title: Sorry for my diabetes
